body:
Comment 1: 
That was riddled with typos. Let me try again.

The old linker would give an error if multiple DATA entries overlapped, by checking that
a non-zero value was not being overwritten. That check has been lost in the translation
to liblink. Make sure the check comes back.

One reasonable way is to check in the assembler. To make the check easy the assembler
could force DATA addresses for a given symbol to appear in increasing order, making the
check O(1).

One way or another, though, this needs to be fixed
